name: jermin sanchez
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hello, my name is Jermin Sanchez, i am 20 years old. I am a highly motivated person who wants to learn everything he can about the cannabis industry. I am an extremely passionate guy who works his hardest. I work great with others, and love being a team player. A perfect fit for your team. It is important to me that i learn everything i can about what it is i am doing. I always try to be my best, so attention to detail comes naturally to me.
experience:
• Pax Food Company - Food prep/warehouse worker. 2 Years
  • Subway - Sandwich Artist/ Shift leader. 1 year and a half.
  • JBZ Automotive Detailing - Detailer. 1 Year
additionalInfo: Over all extremely motivated to learn. Works great in a well organized team.
